articles.description: Premier League clubs spent around £370m in the winter transfer window with Manchester City spending almost as much as the other 19 top-flight teams combined.
articles.title: Deadline day transfers: Winter window spending up on last year

articles.description: As the winter transfer window closes, BBC Sport's chief football writer Phil McNulty gives his verdict.
articles.title: Phil McNulty's deadline day verdict: Manchester United, Arsenal, Man City, Tottenham and Aston Villa

articles.description: As Tottenham win the race to sign France teenager Mathys Tel, BBC Sport look at why the Bayern Munich man was so sought after.
articles.title: Mathys Tel: Who is Tottenham's new signing from Bayern Munich?

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats as Chelsea take on West Ham United in the Premier League.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Chelsea vs West Ham United - preview, team news, stats, score & text commentary

articles.description: After every round of Premier League matches this season Troy Deeney gives us his team of the week. Do you agree with his choices?
articles.title: Troy Deeney's Team of the Week: David Raya, Myles Lewis-Skelly, Chris Wood, Anthony Elanga

articles.description: Manchester City complete the signing of Porto midfielder Nico Gonzalez for 60m euros (£50m).
articles.title: Nico Gonzalez: Manchester City complete signing of Porto midfielder

articles.description: Crystal Palace reject a bid from Tottenham for defender Marc Guehi thought to be around £70m.
articles.title: Marc Guehi transfer: Crystal Palace reject Tottenham bid in region of £70m for England centre-back

articles.description: How can England keep up the pressure? When will Wales end their dismal run? The big talking points from the first round of Six Nations fixtures.
articles.title: Six Nations 2025: England, Ireland, Dupont and more talking points from opening games

articles.description: With slow play a constant blight, Engand Golf's "pace of play stations" initiative could be just the tonic the sport needs, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: 'How England Golf's yellow cards are tackling blight of slow play'

articles.description: Manchester Originals become the second Hundred franchise to partner with an Indian Premier League team after Lancashire agree a deal with Lucknow Super Giants.
articles.title: The Hundred: Lucknow Super Giants buy stake in Manchester Originals
